short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Martı Hotels & Marinas invites you to enjoy its Blue Flag beaches and the natural wonder of its unique locations in Turkey

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Its foundations first laid down in 1967, Martı Hotels & Marinas started its operations in 1969 with Martı Resort Hotel —Turkey’s first resort hotel, which has reached a capacity of 280 rooms today. Still operating as a four-star facility, the 197-room Martı La Perla Hotel joined the group in 1988, followed by the 545-room Martı Myra Hotel in 1995. With its shares traded in the Istanbul Stock Exchange since 1989, Martı Hotel & Marinas is the first company in the Turkish tourism sector that opened to the public.


Providing services to various customer groups with a vast product portfolio, offering various options ranging from the “Ultra All Inclusive” system to the “Half Board” system, Martı Hotels & Marinas has been engaging in collaborations with major domestic, British, German, Belgian, Dutch, Russian, and other tour operators for long years. Enjoying high recognition levels both in Turkey and in Europe, Martı continues its efforts in line with the goal of strengthening its brand and achieving rapid growth by tapping into its 45 years of experience. 


Martı Hotels & Marinas is one of the longest-established companies in Turkish tourism. With its more than 45 years of experience in hotel management, the firm expands its operations and continuously invests in renovation and raises the quality of its services every year.
